Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I know you guys are panicking because the new wing parts have replaced the old ones and now your planes are all redundant, but I figured out that the game automatically replaces the old wing parts with the new ones. All you need to do is change the version number in the .craft file from 0.24.2 (or whatever version it is) to 0.25.0. Trust me, it works.

ejudedude13
Hehe. Thankfully, 0.90 shouldn't change anything like that again.
Also, I suspect this was posted a bit late.

Hehe. Thankfully, 0.90 shouldn't change anything like that again.

Well, except erasing the former Mk3 parts completly, but you know, only i would have used those for an air-breathing plane
I made a mod that brings back all the old wings and mk3 mk2 parts and stuff
